attributes.name: backgroundColor
attributes.description:
Color of the area between the data background and the chart
            border, around labels and around the legend. Hexadecimal
            value or supported named color. For a hex value, use the form:
            textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
            signs or none.

attributes.name: chartHeight
attributes.description: Chart height; integer number of pixels

attributes.name: chartWidth
attributes.description: Chart width; integer number of pixels

attributes.name: dataBackgroundColor
attributes.description:
color for control. For a hex value, use the form:
            textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
            signs or none.

attributes.name: font
attributes.description: Font of data in column.

attributes.name: fontBold
attributes.description: Yes: displays grid control text in bold

attributes.name: fontItalic
attributes.description: Yes: displays grid control text in italics

attributes.name: fontSize
attributes.description: Size of text in column.

attributes.name: foregroundColor
attributes.description:
color for control. For a hex value, use the form:
            textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
            signs or none.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: File format in which to save graph.

attributes.name: gridlines
attributes.description:
Number of grid lines to display on value axis, including
            axis; positive integer.

attributes.name: labelFormat
attributes.description: Format for Y-axis labels.

attributes.name: categoryLabelPositions
attributes.description: Label postion relative to axis: standard, up_45, up_90, down_45, down_90 or horizontal (standard) and vertical (down_90).  Default is horizontal.

attributes.name: markerSize
attributes.description: Size of data point marker. in pixels. Integer.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
Page variable name. String. Generates the the graph as
            binary data and assigns it to the specified variable.
            Suppresses chart display. You can use the name value in
            the cffile tag to write the chart to a file.

attributes.name: pieSliceStyle
attributes.description: Applies to chartseries type attribute value pie.

attributes.name: scaleFrom
attributes.description: Y-axis minimum value; integer

attributes.name: scaleTo
attributes.description: Y-axis max value; integer

attributes.name: seriesPlacement
attributes.description:
Applies to charts that have more than one data series.
            Relative positions of series.

attributes.name: show3D
attributes.description: Display chart with three-dimensional appearance.

attributes.name: showBorder
attributes.description: Whether to display a border around the chart

attributes.name: showLegend
attributes.description:
yes: if chart contains more than one data series, display
            legend

attributes.name: showMarkers
attributes.description:
Applies to chartseries type attribute values line, curve
            and scatter.
            yes: display markers at data points

attributes.name: showXGridlines
attributes.description: yes: display X-axis gridlines

attributes.name: showXLabel
attributes.description: yes: shows the x-axis labels

attributes.name: showTooltip
attributes.description: show the tooltip or not

attributes.name: source
attributes.description: variable name of the source path, if set the path to the source file is returned and no image tag is written to response strea.

attributes.name: showYGridlines
attributes.description: yes: display Y-axis gridlines

attributes.name: sortXAxis
attributes.description:
Display column labels in alphabetic order along X-axis.
            Ignored if the xAxisType attribute is scale.

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: XML file or string to use to specify the style of the chart.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title of the chart.

attributes.name: tipbgcolor
attributes.description:
color for control. For a hex value, use the form:
            textColor = "##xxxxxx", where x = 0-9 or A-F; use two hash
            signs or none.

attributes.name: tipStyle
attributes.description:
Determines the action that opens a popup window to display
            information about the current chart element.
            - mouseDown: display if the user positions the cursor at the element
            and clicks the mouse. Applies only to Flash format graph files (Flash not supported).
            - mouseOver: displays if the user positions the cursor at the element
            - none: suppresses display

attributes.name: url
attributes.description:
URL to open if the user clicks item in a data series; the
            onClick destination page.

attributes.name: xAxisTitle
attributes.description: text; X-axis title

attributes.name: xAxisType
attributes.description:
- category The axis indicates the data category. Data is
            sorted according to the sortXAxis attribute.
            - scale The axis is numeric. All cfchartdata item attribute
            values must numeric. The X axis is automatically sorted
            numerically.

attributes.name: xOffset
attributes.description:
Applies if show3D="yes". Number of units by which to
            display the chart as angled, horizontally

attributes.name: yAxisTitle
attributes.description: text; X-axis title

attributes.name: yAxisType
attributes.description:
Currently has no effect, as Y axis is always used for data
            values. Valid values are category and scale

attributes.name: yOffset
attributes.description:
Applies if show3D="yes". Number of units by which to
            display the chart as angled, horizontally.
